Name: Hailey-Hailey disease
Definition: A pemphigus that is characterized by recurring blistering most commonly occurring in the folds of the skin and has_material_basis_in mutations in the ATP2C1 gene that result in loss of adhesion within the skin.

Name: pemphigus vulgaris
Definition: A pemphigus characterized by autosomal dominant blisters and erosions on the skin and mucous membranes erosions cause by autoantibodies to intercellular cement substance.
